videos.headline: Chris Reynolds throws 22-yard TD pass vs. Illinois
videos.description: Chris Reynolds rolls out and throws a 22-yard TD pass vs. Illinois.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Chris Reynolds throws 22-yard TD pass vs. Illinois) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Illinois forces fumble early in 2nd quarter
videos.description: Sydney Brown forces fumble to give Illinois momentum early in the second quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Illinois forces fumble early in 2nd quarter) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Daniel Barker makes catch in heavy traffic for 10-yard receiving TD
videos.description: Brandon Peters threads the needle to find Daniel Barker for a 10-yard receiving TD.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Daniel Barker makes catch in heavy traffic for 10-yard receiving TD) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Elijah Spencer's spectacular receiving TD gives 49ers the lead
videos.description: Elijah Spencer makes the grab for 27-yard receiving TD

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Elijah Spencer makes the grab for 27-yard receiving TD) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chase Brown crosses goal line for 31-yard rushing touchdown
videos.description: Chase Brown breaks off a hard-fought 31-yard rushing touchdown to give the Fighting Illini a lead in the second half.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Chase Brown crosses goal-line for 31-yard Rushing touchdown) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chase Brown scores 80-yard rushing touchdown vs. Charlotte
videos.description: Chase Brown finds the end zone again, breaking off a huge 80-yard rushing touchdown to for his second score of the day.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Chase Brown scores 80-yard rushing touchdown vs. Charlotte) 2021/10/02 ESHEET
